doc.title: Xexeame katã ƒe ɖoɖowo
doc.checkedUseSetting: Kpɔe ɖa be nàwɔ ɖoɖo sia ŋudɔ.
doc.excludeDomains: Tsɔ domenyiŋkɔ siwo woaɖe ɖa kpee.

example.domain: Àteŋu atsɔ domenyiŋkɔ akpe ɖe eŋu, abe {{url}} ene, be nàɖe domenyiŋkɔ bliboa ɖa.
example.url: Àteŋu aɖe kadodo tɔxɛwo ɖa to kadodo aɖe tsɔtsɔ kpee me, abe {{url}} ene.
example.glob: Àteŋu atsɔ {{glob}} ƒe kpɔɖeŋu, abe {{minimatch}}, akpe ɖe eŋu hena wɔwɔ ɖekae si me mekɔ o.

doc.script: Àte ŋu azã js ŋɔŋlɔdzesiwo hã atsɔ akpɔ dziɖuɖu si de ŋgɔ wu gbɔ.
doc.checkedUseScript: Eɖanye be nàna wò script la nawɔ dɔ o, de dzesii be ele be nàde dzesi aɖaka eveawo le ɣeyiɣi ɖeka me be script la nawɔ dɔ.

example1.commentTitle: Fifia le {{youtube}} nyatakakadzraɖoƒea la, ele be nàʋu {{youtube}} ƒe {{kpɔ}} alo {{shorts}} axa le tab yeye me.
example1.page: : Trɔtrɔ la nye URL nusi le nyatakakadzraɖoƒe si li fifia Ne èdi nyatakakawo la, <a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/URL' target='_blank' rel='noreferrer'> Taflatse kpɔ</a >
example1.pageHost: : Nyatakakadzraɖoƒe si li fifia ƒe domenyiŋkɔ
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Domenyiŋkɔ ɖeka ma ke De dzesii be togbɔ be domenyiŋkɔ vevi siwo le {{youtube}} kple {{ƒomewo}} siaa nye {{mainDomain}} hã la, domenyinyi ƒe ŋkɔ sueawo nye {{youtubeSubDomain}} kple {{. familiesSubDomain}} ɖe wo nɔewo yome Eyata woƒe domenyiŋusẽfianu ŋkɔwo to vovo.
example1.clickpath: : Mɔ si dzi kadodo si dzi nèzi la le
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} tsɔtsɔ sɔ kple wo nɔewo ƒe mɔnu, to {{minimatch}} agbalẽdzraɖoƒe zazã me, zazã mɔnu Taflatse Kpɔ, alo àteŋu adi alesi nàzã {{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Kadodoa aʋu le tab yeye aɖe me le ɖusime
example1.wholeCode: Gɔmesese si le kɔda bliboa ŋu enye be fifia le YouTube ƒe {{www}} domenyiŋkɔ ƒe axa dzi, ne kadodo si wozi la nye domenyiŋkɔ ɖeka eye mɔa dze egɔme kple {{watch}} alo {{shorts}}, ekema tab yeyea axa si le ɖusime la anye Ʋuʋu.
